fetter.title: Frostflake Heron
fetter.detail: Daughter of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Dignified and elegant, as well as wise and strong.

costume.name: Flawless Radiance
costume.description: Kamisato Ayaka's outfit. This kimono features an armor-coated skirt, displaying the nobility and resilience of the Shirasagi Himegimi.

costume.name: Springbloom Missive
costume.description: Ayaka's travel outfit. Its design is based on the Fontaine dresses depicted in light novel illustrations and seems to serve as a window into the lifestyle of proper ladies who live in that nation.

nameCard.name: Kamisato Ayaka: Folding Fan
nameCard.description: Namecard style.\nAyaka does constantly change out the fans she carries with her, of course. If you're buying her some as gifts, remember not to send summer fans or throwing fans. Dancing fans or tea fans are good choices, though.

0.name: Normal Attack: Kamisato Art - Kabuki
0.description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a flurry of sword ki.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

1.name: Kamisato Art: Hyouka
1.description: Summons blooming ice to launch nearby opponents, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.\n\n"Clouds shroud the moonlit night. Longing descends like a fog, filling the one detained with wanderlust."

2.name: Kamisato Art: Senho
2.description: Alternate Sprint Ayaka consumes Stamina and cloaks herself in a frozen fog that moves with her. In Senho form, she moves swiftly upon water. When she reappears, the following effects occur: ·Ayaka unleashes frigid energy to apply Cryo on nearby opponents. ·Coldness condenses around Ayaka's blade, infusing her attacks with Cryo for a brief period. "Feathers fleeting wet / the white heron treads water / a sight without flaw"

4.name: Kamisato Art: Soumetsu
4.description: Summons forth a snowstorm with flawless poise, unleashing a Frostflake Seki no To that moves forward continuously. Frostflake Seki no To ·A storm of whirling icy winds that slashes repeatedly at every enemy it touches, dealing Cryo DMG. ·The snowstorm explodes after its duration ends, dealing AoE Cryo DMG. "The blizzard veils the heron's thoughts, pity heavy in its heart."

5.name: Amatsumi Kunitsumi Sanctification
5.description: After using <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Hyouka</color>, Kamisato Ayaka's Normal and Charged Attacks deal 30% increased DMG for 6s.

6.name: Kanten Senmyou Blessing
6.description: When the Cryo application at the end of <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Senho</color> hits an opponent, Kamisato Ayaka gains the following effects:\n·Restores 10 Stamina\n·Gains 18% <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.

7.name: Fruits of Shinsa
7.description: When Ayaka crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

0.name: Snowswept Sakura
0.description: When Kamisato Ayaka's Normal or Charged Attacks deal <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> to opponents, it has a 50% chance of decreasing the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Hyouka</color> by 0.3s. This effect can occur once every 0.1s.

1.name: Blizzard Blade Seki no To
1.description: When casting <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Soumetsu</color>, unleashes 2 smaller additional Frostflake Seki no To, each dealing 20% of the original storm's DMG.

2.name: Frostbloom Kamifubuki
2.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Soumetsu</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

3.name: Ebb and Flow
3.description: Opponents damaged by <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Soumetsu</color>'s Frostflake Seki no To will have their DEF decreased by 30% for 6s.

4.name: Blossom Cloud Irutsuki
4.description: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Kamisato Art: Hyouka</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

5.name: Dance of Suigetsu
5.description: Kamisato Ayaka gains Usurahi Butou every 10s, increasing her Charged Attack DMG by 298%. This buff will be cleared 0.5s after Ayaka's Charged ATK hits an opponent, after which the timer for this ability will restart.
